Floette (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0669: Flabébé
Pokémon
#0671: Florges →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Floette (TCG Pocket).

Floette has been featured on 8 different cards since it debuted in the Flashfire expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Floette cards are normally Psychic-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Floette

Floette
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Floette Flashfire 64/106 Wild Blaze 052/080
Floette Flashfire 65/106 Xerneas Half Deck   005/014
Generations RC18/RC32 PokéKyun Collection 022/032
Floette BREAKthrough 102/162 Blue Shock 041/059
XY Black Star Promos   XY139 XY-P Promotional cards   171/XY-P
Floette Forbidden Light 85/131 Forbidden Light 059/094
        GX Starter Decks   089/131
Floette Cosmic Eclipse 151/236 Alter Genesis 060/095
Floette Evolving Skies 072/203 Eevee Heroes 038/069
Floette Scarlet & Violet 092/198 Violet ex 043/078
Floette Twilight Masquerade 087/167 Crimson Haze 037/066


This article is part of Project TCG, a Bulbapedia project that aims to report on every aspect of the Pokémon Trading Card Game.
